description.value:
Necrotic

Aura 5

Allies within the aura deal 2d6 extra necrotic damage on melee attacks.
Lalali-Puy regains a spent action point when an enemy cursed by her drops to 0 hit points or fewer.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ force

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+34 vs. Reflex

Hit: 6d8 + 9 force damage, and Lalali-Puy pushes the target 5 squares.

Effect: Lalali-Puy pushes each enemy cursed by her, other than the target, 2 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ force, psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+34 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d8 + 9 force damage, and Lalali-Puy slides the target 4 squares.

Effect: Lalali-Puy slides each enemy cursed by her, other than the target, 2 squares.

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ necrotic, psychic

Standard

Attack: Area burst 2 within 15 (enemies in the burst)

+32 vs. Will

Hit: 6d10 + 3 necrotic and psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Effect: One enemy cursed by Lalali-Puy that she can see is immobilized (save ends).

First Failed Saving Throw: The cursed enemy is stunned instead of immobilized.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of Lalali-Puy's next turn.

At-Will 1/round

Minor

Effect: One creature within 15 squares of Lalali-Puy is cursed (save ends). When Lalali-Puy deals damage with a melee or a ranged attack to a target other than the cursed creature, the cursed creature takes an equal amount of damage.

Recharge 6

Minor

Attack: Close burst 15 (one creature cursed by Lalali-Puy in the burst)

+32 vs. Fortitude

Hit: Lalali-Puy ends one effect on her, including one that does not normally end on a save, and subjects the target to the same effect (save ends).

At-Will

Free

Effect: Lalali-Puy removes her curse from one enemy she can see and ends one effect on her or an ally within 20 squares of her.

At-Will ✦ psychic, teleportation

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy hits Lalali-Puy.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Close burst 15 (the triggering enemy)

+32 vs. Will

Hit: 6d8 + 6 psychic damage, and Lalali-Puy teleports the target 10 squares.

Encounter ✦ necrotic, psychic

Triggered

Trigger: Lalali-Puy is first bloodied.

Attack (No Action): Close burst 15 (enemies in the burst)

+32 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d10 + 3 necrotic and psychic damage, and the target is stunned until the end of Lalali-Puy's next turn.

Effect: The target is subjected to Oba's curse (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 1032; Bloodied 516Init +20 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 42Fort 39Ref 39Will 42
Speed 6, teleport 3
Ability ScoresStr 13 (+15)
Con 26 (+22)		Dex 22 (+20)
Int 27 (+22)		Wis 25 (+21)
Cha 31 (+24)
Languages Common, Primordial
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +27, Diplomacy +29, History +27, Insight +26, Nature +26, Religion +27Senses
Passive Perception 31 | Insight 36

Equipment totem, multiple necklaces

Traits
